SKT_FIRST.name: Like A Fierce Whirlwind
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to increase a random ally's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000050_1_1]</color> chance to increase a random ally's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000050_1_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 확률로 무작위 아군 한 명의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率でランダムの味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。

SKT_SECOND.name: Like A Peaceful Forest
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to reduce the skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Like a Noble Mountain</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> upon taking a critical hit.
description: (Passive Effect) Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000050_2_1]</color> chance to reduce the skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Like a Noble Mountain</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000050_2_1] turn(s)</color> upon taking a critical hit.
SKT_SECOND.name_jp: 徐かなること林の如く
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과) 치명 피격 시 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>고고한 산처럼</color>의 스킬 쿨타임이 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)会心ダメージを受けた場合、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>【動かざること山の如く】</color>のスキルターンが<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少する。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Like A Noble Mountain
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Heals all allies' Health equal to <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> of Flamberge's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases Speed Increase duration by 1 turn

description: Heals all allies' Health equal to <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000050_3_1]</color> of Flamberge's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: 動かざること山の如く
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 플랑베르쥬 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>만큼 회복시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を【フランベルジュ】の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>回復させる。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, gains <color=#28d9ed>15</color> Chain Points.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Increases <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> of a random ally for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, gains <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000050_chain_1_1]</color> Chain Points.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Increases <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> of a random ally for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000050_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>1.5%</color>의 CP를 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> :<color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 무작위 아군 한 명의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、CPを<color=#28d9ed>1.5%</color>獲得する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:ランダムの味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>が<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPする。
